messages.subject: Jim's Kantei
messages.msgSnippet: That was definitely informative. It sure is nice when you have the reasoning behind an attribution. A thing so vexing with Kantei Sho papers. The whys and the
messages.messageBody:
That was definitely informative. It sure is nice when you have the
reasoning behind an attribution. A thing so vexing with Kantei Sho
papers. The whys and the wherefores are the most interesting part.
Would love to see more about any of the various bits and pieces.
Thanks, John
